Detailed Description

Describe Images Request.

Member Function Documentation

- (void EC2DescribeImagesRequest.)addFilter: (EC2Filter *)  filter  

Adds a single object to filters.

This function will alloc and init filters if not already done.

- (NSString * EC2DescribeImagesRequest.)description  

Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

Returns:
A string representation of this object.
- (id EC2DescribeImagesRequest.)init  

Default constructor for a new object.

Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.

Property Documentation

- (NSMutableArray *) executableUsers [read, write, retain]

The optional list of users with explicit launch permissions for the described AMIs.

The user ID can be a user's account ID, 'self' to return AMIs for which the sender of the request has explicit launch permissions, or 'all' to return AMIs with public launch permissions.

- (NSMutableArray *) filters [read, write, retain]

A list of filters used to match properties for Images.

For a complete reference to the available filter keys for this operation, see the <a "http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/">Amazon EC2 API reference.

- (NSMutableArray *) imageIds [read, write, retain]

An optional list of the AMI IDs to describe.

If not specified, all AMIs will be described.

- (NSMutableArray *) owners [read, write, retain]

The optional list of owners for the described AMIs.

The IDs amazon, self, and explicit can be used to include AMIs owned by Amazon, AMIs owned by the user, and AMIs for which the user has explicit launch permissions, respectively.
